name: Presidents of the USA
description: Names of the current and previous presidents of the United States, as of June 2020.

items.name: George Washington
items.description: George Washington is the 1st president, unaffiliated to any party. He was president from April 30, 1789 to March 4, 1797.

items.name: John Adams
items.description: John Adams is the 2nd president, representing the Federalist party. He was president from March 4, 1797 to March 4, 1801.

items.name: Thomas Jefferson
items.description: Thomas Jefferson is the 3rd president, representing the Democratic-Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1801 to March 4, 1809.

items.name: James Madison
items.description: James Madison is the 4th president, representing the Democratic-Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1809 to March 4, 1817.

items.name: James Monroe
items.description: James Monroe is the 5th president, representing the Democratic-Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1817 to March 4, 1825.

items.name: John Quincy Adams
items.description: John Quincy Adams is the 6th president, representing the Democratic-Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1825 to March 4, 1829.

items.name: Andrew Jackson
items.description: Andrew Jackson is the 7th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1829 to March 4, 1837.

items.name: Martin Van Buren
items.description: Martin Van Buren is the 8th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1837 to March 4, 1841.

items.name: William Henry Harrison
items.description: William Henry Harrison is the 9th president, representing the Whig party. He was president from March 4, 1841 to April 4, 1841.

items.name: John Tyler
items.description: John Tyler is the 10th president, representing the Whig party. He was president from April 4, 1841 to March 4, 1845.

items.name: James K. Polk
items.description: James Knox Polk is the 11th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1845 to March 4, 1849.

items.name: Zachary Taylor
items.description: Zachary Taylor is the 12th president, representing the Whig party. He was president from March 4, 1849 to July 9, 1850.

items.name: Millard Fillmore
items.description: Millard Fillmore is the 13th president, representing the Whig party. He was president from July 9, 1850 to March 4, 1853.

items.name: Franklin Pierce
items.description: Franklin Pierce is the 14th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1853 to March 4, 1857.

items.name: James Buchanan
items.description: James Buchanan is the 15th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1857 to March 4, 1861.

items.name: Abraham Lincoln
items.description: Abraham Lincoln is the 16th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1861 to April 15, 1865.

items.name: Andrew Johnson
items.description: Andrew Johnson is the 17th president, representing the National Union party. He was president from April 15, 1865 to March 4, 1869.

items.name: Ulysses S. Grant
items.description: Ulysses Sam Grant is the 18th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1869 to March 4, 1877.

items.name: Rutherford B. Hayes
items.description: Rutherford Birchard Hayes is the 19th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1877 to March 4, 1881.

items.name: James A. Garfield
items.description: James Abram Garfield is the 20th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1881 to September 19, 1881.

items.name: Chester A. Arthur
items.description: Chester A. Arthur is the 21st president, representing the Republican party. He was president from September 19, 1881 to March 4, 1885.

items.name: Grover Cleveland
items.description: Grover Cleveland is the 22th and the 24th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1885 to March 4, 1889, and then again from from March 4, 1893 to March 4, 1897.

items.name: Benjamin Harrison
items.description: Benjamin Harrison is the 23rd president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1889 to March 4, 1893.

items.name: William McKinley
items.description: William McKinley is the 25th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1897 to September 14, 1901.

items.name: Theodore Roosevelt
items.description: Theodore Roosevelt is the 26th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from September 14, 1901 to March 4, 1909.

items.name: William Howard Taft
items.description: William Howard Taft is the 27th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1909 to March 4, 1913.

items.name: Woodrow Wilson
items.description: Woodrow Wilson is the 28th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1913 to March 4, 1921.

items.name: Warren G. Harding
items.description: Warren G. Harding is the 29th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1921 to August 2, 1923.

items.name: Calvin Coolidge
items.description: Calvin Coolidge is the 30th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from August 2, 1923 to March 4, 1929.

items.name: Herbert Hoover
items.description: Herbert Hoover is the 31st president, representing the Republican party. He was president from March 4, 1929 to March 4, 1933.

items.name: Franklin D. Roosevelt
items.description: Franklin D. Roosevelt is the 32nd president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from March 4, 1933 to April 12, 1945.

items.name: Harry S. Truman
items.description: Harry S. Truman is the 33rd president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from April 12, 1945 to January 20, 1953.

items.name: Dwight D. Eisenhower
items.description: Dwight D. Eisenhower is the 34th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from January 20, 1953 to January 20, 1961.

items.name: John F. Kennedy
items.description: John F. Kennedy is the 35th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from January 20, 1961 to November 22, 1963.

items.name: Lyndon B. Johnson
items.description: Lyndon B. Johnson is the 36th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from November 22, 1963 to January 20, 1969.

items.name: Richard Nixon
items.description: Richard Nixon is the 37th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from January 20, 1969 to August 9, 1974.

items.name: Gerald Ford
items.description: Gerald Ford is the 38th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from August 9, 1974 to January 20, 1977.

items.name: Jimmy Carter
items.description: Jimmy Carter is the 39th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from January 20, 1977 to January 20, 1981.

items.name: Ronald Reagan
items.description: Ronald Reagan is the 40th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from January 20, 1981 to January 20, 1989.

items.name: George H. W. Bush
items.description: George H. W. Bush is the 41st president, representing the Republican party. He was president from January 20, 1989 to January 20, 1993.

items.name: Bill Clinton
items.description: Bill Clinton is the 42nd president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from January 20, 1993 to January 20, 2001.

items.name: George W. Bush
items.description: George W. Bush is the 43rd president, representing the Republican party. He was president from January 20, 2001 to January 20, 2009.

items.name: Barack Obama
items.description: Barack Obama is the 44th president, representing the Democratic party. He was president from January 20, 2009 to January 20, 2017.

items.name: Donald Trump
items.description: Donald Trump is the 45th president, representing the Republican party. He was president from January 20, 2017 and still is as of June 25, 2020.
